recipe_name: Seared sesame spiced beef with sweet pepper, courgette and noodles
author: Lesley Waters
method: For the beef, mix the beef together with the soy sauce, sesame seeds, sesame oil and chilli flakes in a bowl and leave to marinate for ten minutes. Heat a griddle pan until hot, add the beef and griddle for 2-3 minutes. For the noodles, heat the olive oil in a pan, add the red pepper and courgette and stir fry for 2-3 minutes. Add the soy sauce, sesame oil and cooked noodles and stir together. Add the coriander and stir. To serve, place the noodles onto a serving plate, top with the beef and garnish with lime halves.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz beef rump, cut into strips,  3 tbsp soy sauce,  1 tbsp sesame seeds,  1 tbsp sesame oil,  ½ tsp dried chilli flakes,  1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ red pepper, sliced,  1 courgette, sliced thinly,  1 tbsp soy sauce,  1 tbsp sesame oil,  150g/5½oz egg noodles, cooked,  3 tbsp chopped fresh coriander leaves,  1 lime, halved, for garnish
